title: Job Openings at Worknigeria
content:
Worknigeria was established with a Singular Vision. To help the vast Nigerian workforce find meaningful jobs. We are also on a mission to upskill them in the best ways possible and help them grow with and within their careers.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Hatchery Supervisor

Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Work Structure: Onsite

About the Role


	Our client is expanding its poultry operations and seeking a Hatchery Supervisor to support the Hatchery Manager in delivering excellent hatchery performance and high-quality day-old chicks.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Oversee daily hatchery operations: egg setting, candling, transfer, hatching, and chick dispatch.
	Operate and monitor automated incubators/hatchers, reporting issues.
	Enforce hygiene and biosecurity standards.
	Train and supervise hatchery staff.
	Keep accurate hatchery records and monitor chick quality.
	Assist with planning, reporting, and smooth chick deliveries.


Requirements


	Diploma / Bachelor’s Degree in Animal Science, Poultry Science, Veterinary Medicine, or related field.
	3–5 years of experience in a commercial hatchery.
	Knowledge of automated incubation systems (e.g., Petersime, Jamesway, ChickMaster).
	Strong grasp of hatchery hygiene and chick handling.
	Supervisory experience is an advantage.


Salary
N180,000 – N200,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 10th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@worknigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Feed Mill Manager

Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	The Feed Mill Manager will oversee daily feed mill operations, manage staff and equipment, and ensure efficient production of consistent, high-quality feed.
	A key requirement of this role is the ability to formulate nutritionally balanced feed for multiple livestock categories based on scientific principles, market demand, and company standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee all feed mill operations including raw material intake, grinding, mixing, pelleting, and bagging.
	Formulate feed for poultry, goats, pigs, fish, and other livestock based on nutritional requirements and market demand.
	Ensure feed quality meets industry standards and internal specifications.
	Monitor inventory of raw materials and finished products; coordinate procurement with the supply chain team.
	Supervise feed mill staff, provide training, and enforce safety and operational protocols.
	Maintain and service feed mill machinery and equipment to minimize downtime.
	Implement cost control measures to optimize efficiency and profitability.
	Prepare and present production and quality control reports to management.
	Collaborate with veterinary and nutrition experts to improve feed performance and livestock productivity.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Animal Nutrition, Animal Science, Feed Technology, or a related field.
	7 - 10 years of proven experience in feed mill operations, with at least 3 years in a managerial role.
	Strong expertise in feed formulation for multiple livestock species (poultry, goat, pig, fish).
	Proficiency with feed formulation software and modern feed production technology.
	Solid knowledge of raw materials, quality assurance, and feed safety standards.
	Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.


Application Closing Date: 4th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@worknigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Hatchery Manager

Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	The Hatchery Manager will oversee daily hatchery operations, manage automated incubators, enforce strict biosecurity standards, and ensure optimal hatchability and chick quality.
	This is a senior technical and leadership role that requires strong expertise in incubation technology and people management.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage daily hatchery operations from egg setting to chick dispatch.
	Operate, monitor, and maintain automated incubators and hatchers.
	Ensure optimal incubation parameters for maximum hatchability.
	Maintain high biosecurity, hygiene, and compliance standards.
	Lead, train, and supervise hatchery staff.
	Ensure production of healthy, uniform day-old chicks for internal and external customers.
	Collaborate with breeder farms and feed mill to align production schedules.
	Prepare and present operational reports to management.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor's Degree in Animal Science, Poultry Science, Veterinary Medicine, or related field.
	7 – 10 years of experience in commercial poultry hatchery management.
	Proven track record with automated incubation systems (e.g., Petersime, Jamesway, ChickMaster).
	Strong knowledge of hatchery hygiene, chick quality, and biosecurity management.
	Leadership experience in managing large hatchery teams.


Application Closing Date: 4th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@worknigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
